title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Ripple’s $1B buy-back plan fails to lift price: Can XRP still rebound?
contentSnippet: Holding above $2 increases XRP's potential to retest $3 in the coming weeks, while also maintaining a record high target of around $7.75.

title: UK tax authority doubles crypto warning letters in crackdown on unpaid gains
contentSnippet: HMRC sent nearly 65,000 warning letters to crypto investors last year, more than double the previous year, as the UK steps up efforts to trace undeclared capital gains.

title: DOGE Finds Support After Tariff-Led Selloff, Market Awaits Next Catalyst
contentSnippet: The session’s 7% swing came amid renewed macro jitters and reports of large whale liquidations totaling over $74 million.

title: XRP Stabilizes After Early Dip, Traders Eye $2.40 Breakout
contentSnippet: The move came amid renewed U.S.–China tariff fears and cautious positioning ahead of next week’s SEC deadlines for spot XRP ETFs.

title: Bitcoin ETFs shed $1.2B in red week, but Schwab remains bullish
contentSnippet: Bitcoin ETFs lost $1.22 billion this week as BTC fell, but Schwab reported its clients now own 20% of all US crypto ETPs.

title: OneKeyが12万件のビットコイン秘密鍵脆弱性を報告、トラストウォレットに影響か
contentSnippet: ワンキーがリブビットコイン・エクスプローラー3.xの脆弱性により約12万件のビットコイン秘密鍵がクラッキング可能になると報告した。トラストウォレットなど複数の製品が影響を受けている模様。

title: オープンシーが2026年1QにSEAトークン発行予定、供給量の50%をコミュニティへ配布
contentSnippet: オープンシーCEOが2026年第1四半期のSEAトークン発行を発表した。総供給量の50%がコミュニティに配分され、収益の50%が買い戻しに使用される。ステーキング機能も実装予定だ。

title: Bitcoin Coinbase Premium weakens but RSI mirrors April bottom zone
contentSnippet: The Bitcoin Coinbase Premium Index turned negative as BTC’s RSI hit its lowest level since April, but it could also mark the beginning of a slow recovery.

title: G20、グローバルな仮想通貨規制の不足を指摘　ステーブルコインの課題も
contentSnippet: 国際的な金融監督機関FSBが、ビットコインなど仮想通貨の規制実施状況を評価する報告書を発表。各国規制の断片化と一貫性の欠如を指摘し、ステーブルコイン監督の課題も述べた。

title: NAV Collapse Creates Rare Opportunity in Bitcoin Treasurys: 10x Research
contentSnippet: Bitcoin treasury firms saw NAV premiums collapse as retail lost billions, but the reset created entry points for a new era of skilled asset managers, say researchers.

title: ‘Bitcoin smells trouble’ as banks are stressed and ‘yields are puking’ - Strike CEO
contentSnippet: Regional banks faced renewed stress despite 2023 crisis reforms, with Zions and Western Alliance stocks plunging as Bitcoin fell to a four-month low.

title: 著名ユーチューバー「ミスタービースト」、仮想通貨取引所商標を申請
contentSnippet: 登録者4億4600万人のユーチューバー、ミスタービーストが仮想通貨取引やDEX運営を含む金融プラットフォームの商標を申請した。バンキングや投資サービスも提供する計画だ。

title: 決済大手ストライプ支援のL1チェーン「テンポ」、750億円を調達　イーサリアムOBが参画
contentSnippet: ストライプとパラダイムが支援する決済特化型L1ブロックチェーン「テンポ」が750億円を調達した。評価額は7,500億円に達し、著名イーサリアム開発者も参画する。

title: スイス当局、FIFAのNFTプラットフォームを違法賭博として刑事告発
contentSnippet: スイス賭博監督局がFIFAのブロックチェーン型NFTプラットフォームを違法な賭博サービスとして刑事告発した。参加に金銭的賭け金が必要で、賞金獲得が抽選で決まる仕組みが宝くじやスポーツベッティングに該当すると判断された。

title: オープンシーがNFT特化から事業転換、22チェーン対応の仮想通貨取引所に＝報道
contentSnippet: NFT市場の崩壊を経たオープンシーが、22ブロックチェーン対応のマルチチェーン仮想通貨取引アグリゲーターに転換すると報じられた。

title: アーサー・ヘイズのMaelstrom、仮想通貨企業の買収ファンドを計画　370億円超規模
contentSnippet: アーサー・ヘイズ氏は、仮想通貨企業をターゲットにした企業買収ファンドの構想があることを明かした。ファンドの規模は370億円超で、投資インフラや分析プラットフォームなどのサービスプロバイダーに特化する。

title: Huobi創設者が1500億円規模のイーサリアム保有企業設立へ、アジア投資家が参画
contentSnippet: 中国の仮想通貨取引所Huobi創設者リー・リン氏が、アジアの初期イーサリアム支援者らと10億ドル規模のデジタル資産信託を立ち上げる。ナスダック上場企業買収を交渉中で、2-3週間以内に発表予定だ。

title: Tempo, Stripe’s new blockchain, hits $5B valuation in $500M funding round
contentSnippet: Led by Thrive Capital and Greenoaks, the raise comes less than two months after Stripe unveiled its layer-1 blockchain for stablecoin and real-world payments.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: 米地方銀行の不良債権増加で金が大幅続伸、2023年破綻危機の再来懸念か
contentSnippet: 米地方銀行が不良債権を償却し株価が急落する中、金価格は今週7.34%上昇した。JPモルガンCEOが更なる問題発生を警告し、投資家は2023年の銀行危機再来を懸念している。

title: Huobi founder raises $1B as part of Ether trust strategy: Report
contentSnippet: The founder of the Chinese cryptocurrency exchange plans to announce the trust within a few weeks, with the backing of Ether supporters.

title: Relax, That's Not a Stranger in Your House—It's Just an AI Prank
contentSnippet: A viral prank using AI-generated photos of a “homeless man” inside people’s homes has led to 911 calls, police warnings, and backlash over its cruelty.

title: Stripe's Tempo Blockchain Raises $500 Million, Poaches Prominent Ethereum Dev
contentSnippet: Dankrad Feist has left the Ethereum Foundation to help build Stripe's Tempo blockchain, which Fortune reports is now valued at $5 billion.

title: YouTube Star MrBeast Files Trademark for Crypto Exchange and Payments Service
contentSnippet: MrBeast trademarks crypto exchange app, but regulatory hurdles remain before the YouTube star can launch MrBeast Financial.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Bleed as Traders Weigh End of 4-Year Cycle
contentSnippet: Experts believe that some retail traders still follow the four-year Bitcoin cycle rulebook, accounting for part of crypto’s recent decline.

title: Astra Nova Raises $48.3M to Grow Web3, AI Entertainment Ecosystem
contentSnippet: The company develops no-code tools that enable creators to launch blockchain-based entertainment experiences.

title: Why Wintermute and Other Market Makers Stopped Trading During Bitcoin Crash, $19B Liquidation
contentSnippet: Market makers paused trading during last week's flash crash, potentially adding to the volatility. Here’s what happened.

title: Your Company's Balance Sheet is Doomed Without Bitcoin
contentSnippet: The traditional corporate playbook risks not only underperformance, but a breach of fiduciary duty as cash reserves bleed away on the altar of money-printing, argues Musqet founder David Parkinson.

title: Chainlink's LINK Plunges 9% as Intense Selling Overpowers Caliber's $2M Accumulation
contentSnippet: Nasdaq-listed Caliber purchased $2 million LINK while the Chainlink Reserve added nearly 60,000 tokens, but bears remain in control.

title: Here's When to Expect the SEA Token as OpenSea Trading Volume Spikes
contentSnippet: NFT marketplace and token trading platform OpenSea will launch its SEA token in Q1 2026, with 50% allocated for its community of users.

title: 9 Biggest Bitcoin Crashes in History
contentSnippet: Mt. Gox hacks, China bans, COVID panic, and the FTX implosion: Here’s a brief history of the biggest price crashes in Bitcoin history.

title: Huobi Founder Li Lin to Lead $1B Ether Treasury Firm: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Li Lin’s Avenir Capital is said to be teaming up with Asia's crypto pioneers to build a regulated vehicle focused on ether accumulation.

title: Gold's Record Frenzy Spurs Tokenized Gold’s $1B Daily Volume
contentSnippet: Investors are increasingly tapping gold-backed crypto tokens for active trading and hedging, a CEX.io report said.

title: Here's What Bitcoin Traders Should Watch Out for This Weekend
contentSnippet: Bitcoin fell early Friday as tariff tensions and banking concerns weigh on markets. Analysts are monitoring the key $103,000 support level.

title: Stellar Lumen's XLM Token Down 6% Amid Heavy Sell Pressure
contentSnippet: Stellar Lumens (XLM) slid 6.25% amid heavy institutional liquidation, even as the network’s latest protocol upgrade strengthened its enterprise-grade transaction capabilities.

title: FIFA Hit With Swiss Criminal Complaint Over NFT World Cup Ticket Vouchers
contentSnippet: FIFA's Avalanche-based NFT collectibles platform is now the subject of a formal criminal complaint filed by Switzerland's gambling authority.

title: Hedera's HBAR Slides 11% as Selling Pressure Deepens
contentSnippet: Hedera’s native token faced sustained downward momentum over the past 24 hours, testing key support near $0.16 amid heightened trading activity and persistent bearish sentiment.

title: Arthur Hayes’ Maelstrom Seeks $250M Private Equity Fund to Acquire Crypto Firms: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Arthur Hayes’ Maelstrom family office is launching a private equity fund targeting infrastructure and analytics firms in crypto, aiming for $250 million in capital.

title: Morning Minute: Bitcoin Falls Again as JPMorgan Blames Crypto Natives for Selloff
contentSnippet: And sell off they have, as Bitcoin hit a new four-month low overnight—turning crypto markets deep red.
